entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Clinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clinton 06:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -17.0°C
Wind: ESE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
